INSERT INTO `le_orgorderstatistics` (`id`, `leasescompanyid`, `organid`, `cityid`, `ordermoney`, `carorders`, `pickuporders`, `dropofforders`, `confirmedorders`, `processedorders`, `starttime`, `endtime`, `createtime`, `updatetime`, `status`)
select uuid(), companyid leasescompanyid, organid, oncity, ifnull(sum(shouldpayamount), 0) ordermoney, sum(case when t.ordertype in ('1') then 1 else 0 end) carorders, sum(case when t.ordertype in ('2') then 1 else 0 end) pickuporders, sum(case when t.ordertype in ('3') then 1 else 0 end) dropofforders, sum(case when t.reviewstatus in ('2') then 1 else 0 end) confirmedorders, sum(case when t.reviewstatus in ('1') then 1 else 0 end) processedorders, #{startDate} starttime, #{endDate} endtime, now() createtime, now() updatetime, '1' status from org_order t where t.orderstatus = '7' and t.usetype = '0' and t.paymethod = '2' and t.paymentstatus in ('2','3','4') and t.status = 1
and DATE_FORMAT(usetime, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startDate} and DATE_FORMAT(usetime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endDate}
group by t.companyid, t.organid, t.oncity

INSERT INTO `le_personalorderstatistics` (`id`, `leasescompanyid`, `cityid`, `type`,`ordertype`, `paymethod`, `ordernum`,`difforders`, `confirmedorders`, `processedorders`, `ordermoney`, `diffmoney`, `starttime`, `endtime`, `createtime`, `updatetime`, `status`)
select uuid(), companyid leasescompanyid, oncity,'0' type,ordertype, paymethod, count(1) ordernum, sum((select count(*) from org_order o where o.orderno = t.orderno and (t.shouldpayamount - t.actualpayamount !=0))) AS difforders, sum(case when t.reviewstatus in ('2') then 1 else 0 end) confirmedorders, sum(case when t.reviewstatus in ('1') then 1 else 0 end) processedorders, sum(ifnull(shouldpayamount,0))ordermoney, (sum(ifnull(shouldpayamount,0))- sum(ifnull(actualpayamount,0))) diffmoney, #{startDate} starttime, #{endDate} endtime, now() createtime, now() updatetime, '1' status from org_order t where t.orderstatus = '7' and ((t.usetype = '0' and t.paymethod = '1') or (t.usetype = '1' and t.paymethod = '0')) and t.paymentstatus in ('0','1') and t.status = 1
and DATE_FORMAT(usetime, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startDate} and DATE_FORMAT(usetime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endDate}
group by t.companyid, t.oncity, t.ordertype, t.paymethod

INSERT INTO `le_personalorderstatistics` (`id`, `leasescompanyid`, `cityid`, `type`,`ordertype`, `paymentstatus`, `ordernum`,`difforders`,`confirmedorders`, `processedorders`, `ordermoney`, `diffmoney`, `starttime`, `endtime`, `createtime`, `updatetime`, `status`)
select uuid(), companyid leasescompanyid, oncity,'1' type,ordertype,paymentstatus, count(1) ordernum, sum((select count(*) from op_order o where o.orderno = t.orderno and (t.shouldpayamount - t.actualpayamount !=0))) AS difforders, sum(case when t.reviewstatus in ('2') then 1 else 0 end) confirmedorders, sum(case when t.reviewstatus in ('1') then 1 else 0 end) processedorders, sum(ifnull(shouldpayamount,0))ordermoney, (sum(ifnull(shouldpayamount,0))- sum(ifnull(actualpayamount,0))) diffmoney, #{startDate} starttime, #{endDate} endtime, now() createtime, now() updatetime, '1' status from op_order t where t.orderstatus = '7' and t.paymentstatus in ('0','1') and t.status = 1
and DATE_FORMAT(usetime, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startDate} and DATE_FORMAT(usetime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endDate}
group by t.companyid, t.oncity, t.ordertype,t.paymentstatus
